select #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Ver via:', ['Streamcloud', 'Streamplay', 'openload']) channels = [ '$doregex[streamcloud]', '$doregex[streamplay]'], '$doregex[openload]' return channels[ret]
streamcloud #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import urlresolver url = '[makelist.param2]' try: u = urlresolver.resolve(url) except: u = 'http://www.gruponetai.com/videos/error.mp4' return u
streamplay #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import urlresolver url = '[makelist.param3]' try: u = urlresolver.resolve(url) except: u = 'http://www.gruponetai.com/videos/error.mp4' return u
